title: Cheapest tariffs by payment method: Typical domestic dual fuel customer (GB)
publisher: The Office of Gas and Electricity Markets
description: Interactive chart - This data compares the cheapest available tariffs offered by the six large suppliers with the cheapest tariff available in the market by payment method (direct debit, standard credit and prepayment). Figures are based on a typical domestic dual fuel customer paying by direct debit.
datasetNotes: Landing page consists of a series of interactive charts. Relevant chart is the middle right most chart. Clicking on chart expands it and reveals a menu button top right corner with an option to downlaod as a CSV.

transformStage.source_name: The Office of Gas and Electricity Markets

Payment_Method: Values one of ['Large legacy suppliers (direct debit)', 'Large legacy suppliers (standard credit)', 'Large legacy suppliers (prepayment)', 'Market (direct debit)', 'Market (standard credit)', 'Market (prepayment)']

Value: Values taken from ['Large legacy suppliers (direct debit)', 'Large legacy suppliers (standard credit)', 'Large legacy suppliers (prepayment)', 'Market (direct debit)', 'Market (standard credit)', 'Market (prepayment)'] columns
Removed commas and whitespaces from Values

notes: Interactive chart with CSV download option.
